channel.title: Lifestyle on Zhenyu Ren's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Lifestyle on Zhenyu Ren's Website

item.title: A Long-term Losing Weight Campaign
item.description: Weight Tracking Record Note 1. Page content is generated via GPT:) in 5 minutes, which convinces me that AI will let front end enginners lose their jobs, at least. (I am not a blind AI supporter. I used to think I was good at coding and proud of it. But now I feel that I may need to learn something different in the age of LLM.) 2. Starting from October
